articles.description: Stock awards pushed median compensation to a sixth-straight record, and nine CEOs got packages of $50 million or more.
articles.content: The median pay package for chief executives of the biggest U.S. companies reached $14.7 million in 2021, setting a sixth-straight annual record as strong profits and robust markets boosted performanc… [+247 chars]
